Method Detail

getUserTxLocation

public java.lang.String getUserTxLocation()

setUserTxLocation

public void setUserTxLocation(java.lang.String userTxURL)
Set the JNDI URL at which the Application Server's UserTransaction can be found. If not set, the default value is "java:comp/UserTransaction" - which works for nearly all application servers.

lookup

public javax.transaction.UserTransaction lookup()
                                         throws SchedulerException
